WorkItem.ClosedComment: The fix should be visible in the upcoming release. Thanks!
WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

I was playing around with Enums and noticed that when a function returns an enum type if you assign that result to a variable, you then get intellisense on that variable as though you could access all the enum values (when the result should be a number (that is one of the enum values)).

Expected: Intellisense should probably give the options that would show for a number

Actual: We seem to get intellisense for all of the enum values.

![Image](http://i.imgur.com/1KrTede.png)



Here is a simpler example that illustrates the problem

![Image](http://i.imgur.com/pVh0TOj.png)



Thoughts? Thanks.
WorkItem.Summary: Intellisense on Enum return type should not give all enum values.
